subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Arsenal stunned Barcelona with a second-half comeback in the Champions League on Wednesday in London, with the substitute Andrey Arshavin scoring the winner in the 83rd minute in a 2-1 victory.
snippet: Arsenal stunned Barcelona with a second-half comeback in the Champions League on Wednesday in London, with the substitute Andrey Arshavin scoring the winner in the 83rd minute in a 2-1 victory.
